CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y python2.7 xz-utils default-jre wget &&     update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/python python /usr/bin/python2.7 1 &&     wget https://s3.amazonaws.com/mozilla-games/emscripten/releases/emsdk-portable.tar.gz &&     tar --strip-components=1 -xzvf emsdk-portable.tar.gz &&     rm emsdk-portable.tar.gz &&     rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
